name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: Identifier for a person within a particular scope.

name: $addidentifier
desc: Identifier for a person within a particular scope.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Identifier for a person within a particular scope.

name: $active
desc: Returns: Whether this related person record is in active use.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Whether this related person record is in active use.

name: $patient
desc: Returns: The patient this person is related to.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The patient this person is related to.

name: $relationship
desc: Returns: The nature of the relationship between a patient and the related person.

name: $addrelationship
desc: The nature of the relationship between a patient and the related person.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The nature of the relationship between a patient and the related person.

name: $::name
desc: Returns: A name associated with the person.

name: $addname
desc: A name associated with the person.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A name associated with the person.

name: $telecom
desc: Returns: A contact detail for the person, e.g. a telephone number or an email address.

name: $addtelecom
desc: A contact detail for the person, e.g. a telephone number or an email address.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A contact detail for the person, e.g. a telephone number or an email address.

name: $gender
desc: Returns: Administrative Gender - the gender that the person is considered to have for administration and record keeping purposes.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Administrative Gender - the gender that the person is considered to have for administration and record keeping purposes.

name: $birthDate
desc: Returns: The date on which the related person was born.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The date on which the related person was born.

name: $address
desc: Returns: Address where the related person can be contacted or visited.

name: $addaddress
desc: Address where the related person can be contacted or visited.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Address where the related person can be contacted or visited.

name: $photo
desc: Returns: Image of the person.

name: $addphoto
desc: Image of the person.

name: $period
desc: Returns: The period of time during which this relationship is or was active. If there are no dates defined, then the interval is unknown.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The period of time during which this relationship is or was active. If there are no dates defined, then the interval is unknown.

name: $communication
desc: Returns: A language which may be used to communicate with about the patient's health.

name: $addcommunication
desc: A language which may be used to communicate with about the patient's health.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A language which may be used to communicate with about the patient's health.
